price: ለእነዚያ ለሚገደሉት (ምእመናን) እነርሱ የተበደሉ በመኾናቸው (መጋደል) ተፈቀደላቸው፡፡ አላህም እነርሱን በመርዳት ላይ በእርግጥ ቻይ ነው፡፡
arabic: أُذِنَ لِلَّذِينَ يُقَٰتَلُونَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ ظُلِمُواْۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ نَصۡرِهِمۡ لَقَدِيرٌ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: udhina lilladhīna yuqātalūna bi-annahum ẓulimū wa-inna al-laha ʿalā naṣrihim laqadīrun
